Title: Fear, and Other Smells
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Nick Jones, Piper Kerman (book), Jordan Harrison (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: Piper gets creative in order to grow her new business. Crazy Eyes's sci-fi sex story for drama class is a hit. Alex doesn't trust a new inmate named Lolly.
